text: The 1928 Miami Hurricanes football team represented the University of Miami for the 1928 college football season. The Hurricanes played their home games at Moore Park in Miami, Florida. The team was coached by Cub Buck, in his second varsity season, the final year as head coach for the Hurricanes. ==Schedule== ==References== Miami Category:Miami Hurricanes football seasons Miami Hurricanes football
title: 1928 Miami Hurricanes football team
